name: Idle Shapes
description:
Idle Shapes is a pure idle game with simple mechanics but truly addictive gameplay.

Collect various shapes, buy upgrades and use prestige system to proceed as far as you can and reach the final goal. Every upgrade matters, every prestige purchase is important. No endless goals and infinite boring gameplay. Just pure fun and reachable goals.

Benefits:
  • Addictive gameplay with idle mechanics
  • First idle game without ridiculous exponential prices growth
  • Dozens stats to upgrade. Nothing unnecessary
  • A reasonable increase in difficulty and constant sense of progress
  • Maximize your passive income with various options
  • Prestige system. Reset your progress to reach new heights
  • Stylish minimalistic graphics with cool neon glow
  • Achievable goals. The game can be completed
  • Even more fun and challenges once the game is finished
  • Various achievements to unlock
  • Global ranking system

Are you tired of idle games overloaded with useless mechanics and infinite goals? Then Idle Shapes is your choice. Just try and you'll like it.
